html:
12.18.19  1:18 am   Where was your long long long journey taken you, and do you feel accomplished by this journey?

     i thought that story was about you

12.18.19  1:01 am   So, how's your month been so far

     it has been kind of equivalent to 1000 spy novels, all merged together backwards and forwards

12.18.19  12:49 am   Have you been having a nice week? :)

     pretty good but i'm not sure when it was supposed to begin and end

12.18.19  12:47 am   Is the umbrella that is your YouTube profile pic inside or outside? Superstitious at all?

     it's in the door way

12.18.19  12:30 am   2+2?

     don't even get me started

12.18.19  12:28 am   What's a weird flute

     hadron particle collider

12.17.19  11:55 pm   will you be ready to transcend this plane of existence soon?

     not quite, still very much work to do

12.17.19  11:47 pm   What are your New Year's resolutions for 2020?

     i don't make resolutions for new years. i just make resolutions whenever i need to, without checking to see if it's new years

12.17.19  11:19 pm   what's in the fragile box

     instructions for how to build more boxes

12.17.19  10:50 pm   cats can have a little salami as a treat

     that may be true but i'm not sure

12.17.19  10:47 pm   i really struggle with hearing my own voice on tape,

     tape?????

      and it stops me from trying to make music. how do you get over the initial shock and weirdness of hearing your own voice? or was this never a problem for you? 

     it was so long ago that i don't really remember, but i don't think it's that hard to get over. even easier if you feel like your life depends on it

12.17.19  10:44 pm   i've lost my creativity:(

     you most likely put it into your creations

      how do i get it back?

     you can get new creativity

      does this ever happen to you? 

     yes, but always remember the golden rule. creativity is contagious. i dare you to not be creative

12.17.19  10:42 pm   do you like electricity

     yes

12.17.19  10:40 pm   so i've written drafts for a bunch of songs, and i like them, but i'm kind of worried they're actually all terrible and suck. should i care? does it matter? should i try and finalize and publish them or just hoard them? idk what to do please advise

     i will recommend this all day, even though it probably doesn't work for anyone besides me. but wow oh wow it really worked for me, to help with this exact problem. if you experiencing too much pressure and fear about the entire song creation process, try doing much shorter songs. you will learn your way around every aspect of the song creation process quicker, and you will be able to easily scale up your operations gradually from there. i have started to realize this probably doesn't work for anyone other than me, because i never hear about anyone doing this. but it has worked so insanely well for me, i owe my entire life to this method

12.17.19  10:27 pm   what is your favorite word

     car wash

12.17.19  10:18 pm   Do you have title ideas for the videos?

     yes

      If so please name them just cause, yeah (unless you don't wanna cause spoilers and stuff)?

     cannot

12.17.19  10:15 pm   who is the man with the lion's mask

     have you considered that it might be an actual lion

12.17.19  10:14 pm   should i do my homework

     yes, but let other people do some of it, to share the experience

12.17.19  10:05 pm   I have thoughts sometimes, what should I do with them?

     depict them

12.17.19  9:59 pm   how do you feel about freewill?

     seems legit

12.17.19  9:37 pm   sorry if i scared everyone recently

     that's ok

12.17.19  9:25 pm   did u know that wikipedia is currently really struggling? whenever i go on there website they really want me to donate my money. 

     they ask for donations every year. that is their primary source of income. wikipedia is one of the biggest websites in the world and it is totally free. they may not be struggling, but they always need donations. if you use and love wikipedia, and if you can possibly afford it, i certainly recommend donating. i have donated quite a few times because the site is extremely useful for me, and everyone i've ever met

12.17.19  9:23 pm   Will you update your super cool and creative and amazing and surprisingly not-surprisingly surprising website?

     yes, i always do

12.17.19  9:23 pm   Bill, I love what you do. Thanks for everything! <3

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

      Do you like pancakes?

     they are a good blank canvas, on which to paint breakfast

12.17.19  9:22 pm   what languages would you like to learn

     story telling

12.17.19  9:15 pm   what is a wall,

     very difficult to describe, but it's like blindfold for the entire room

      and why are religions existent?

     people naturally get together in community and praise the mighty essense of life, and then at some point things go a little haywire, and that's when it usually starts being called religion, especially by perplexed onlookers

12.17.19  9:15 pm   what is your stance on standing

     very good. recommended position.

12.17.19  9:12 pm   how do i paint the moon?

     see if you can get the russians to do it

12.17.19  8:54 pm   what's your least favorite  number

     every time i think i think of a bad number i realize how good it is

12.17.19  8:53 pm   any good book suggestions?

     diary of samuel pepys

12.17.19  8:42 pm   can you tell where these questions come from? (asking for a friend)

     you

12.17.19  8:38 pm   hi

have you ever thought about making longer songs from short song pieces used in videos?, such as the castle song from "ball & stick" or various monday videos where the background song just fades out.

1 example: monday-question-questions.mp4

have a nice day.

     that usually seems inappropriate, because those pieces were constructed specifically to be used in the video they're used in. the paradox that occurs is, because it's placed in a video, it causes the viewers to get attached to those musical bits, and insist that they should be longer, when really it might just be redundant, and not the best choice. i am looking for a way to use this phenomenon sensibly

12.17.19  8:33 pm   Can u make more music pls :)

     yes

12.17.19  8:22 pm   who answers these questions (besides you)?

     [~~question answerer~~]

12.17.19  8:08 pm   If you put on enough glasses can you see into the fourth dimension?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.17.19  8:02 pm   How are you sexy pants 

     my name is regular pants but i am doing pretty good

12.17.19  7:49 pm   Why is Australia a country and a continent?

     must have been in the right place at the right time

12.17.19  7:42 pm   What are your thoughts on thoughts?

     it's like another world, in your mind!

12.17.19  6:44 pm   ok bill how do we know this isnt you making questions for yourself and answering them?

     i realize it's impossible for me to prove that i don't do that but i never do that. for me that would ruin the most valuable aspect of this page

      bet you wont reply if i am right

12.17.19  6:30 pm   tell us your basics when comes to viewing the world?

     anyone might be you. treat them accordingly

12.17.19  6:14 pm   One of my good friends has been benign extremely rude recently and now I'm just starting to think that she doesn't want to be seen without friends and that's why she talks to me, what do I do?

     leave her alone

12.17.19  6:07 pm   what is a reason to get up in the morning

     do stuff

     the NFL

     it's like another world, in your mind!

12.17.19  4:56 pm   What did you mean by "might quit"

     'it's the first day of school, and i think i might quit.' it's like you just got to school on the first day, but wow this isn't making sense and it feels all weird and wrong, so you are thinking of quitting school and trying to make it on your own

12.17.19  4:39 pm   what should i do if my squirrel won't sing for me

     sing for it

12.17.19  4:36 pm   What will happen if I don't pay my taxes?

     5 or 10 years later they may figure out how to temporarily freeze your bank account

12.17.19  4:19 pm   What is your favorite airport terminal?

     denver
